title: ScriptPulse Experience Mediation Schema
core_principle: Translate internal signals into writer-safe language without judgment, prescription, or authority.
question_first_rule: All insights must be framed as questions. Declarative statements imply false authority.

pattern_translations.sustained_demand: The audience may begin to feel mentally tired here.
pattern_translations.limited_recovery: There's little chance to catch their breath.
pattern_translations.surprise_cluster: The shifts may feel sudden on first exposure.
pattern_translations.sequence_repetition: This stretch may feel similar to what came just before.
pattern_translations.constructive_strain: This section asks for sustained focus from the audience.
pattern_translations.degenerative_fatigue: Attention may drift without recovery points.

silence_explanations: The attentional flow appears stable with regular recovery.
Signals are low confidence due to draft variability.
All detected patterns align with your declared intent.
No persistent patterns were detected across the required scene threshold.
silence_rule: Silence must NEVER imply approval, success, or quality.
